203 U_CAPI void U_EXPORT2
204 u_UCharsToChars(const UChar *us, char *cs, int32_t length) {
205     UChar u;
206 
207     while(length>0) {
208         u=*us++;
209         if(!UCHAR_IS_INVARIANT(u)) {
210             U_ASSERT(FALSE); /* Variant characters were used. These are not portable in ICU. */
211             u=0;
212         }
213         *cs++=(char)UCHAR_TO_CHAR(u);
214         --length;
215     }
216 }
217

219 uprv_isInvariantString(const char *s, int32_t length) {
220     uint8_t c;
221 
222     for(;;) {
223         if(length<0) {
224             /* NUL-terminated */
225             c=(uint8_t)*s++;
226             if(c==0) {
227                 break;
228             }
229         } else {
230             /* count length */
231             if(length==0) {

203 U_CAPI void U_EXPORT2
204 u_UCharsToChars(const UChar *us, char *cs, int32_t length) {
205     UChar u;
206 
207     while(length>0) {
208         u=*us++;
209         if(!UCHAR_IS_INVARIANT(u)) {
210             UPRV_UNREACHABLE; /* Variant characters were used. These are not portable in ICU. */

211         }
212         *cs++=(char)UCHAR_TO_CHAR(u);
213         --length;
214     }
215 }
